text: Menelaos Chatzigeorgiou (30 November 1924 - 12 October 2020) was a Greek politician and athlete. He was a member of the European People's Party. He was born in Thessaloniki, Greece. Between 1990 to 1994, he was a member of the European Parliament. As an athlete, he played for the Aris Thessaloniki. Chadzigeorgiou died on 12 October 2020 in Athens at the age of 95.Πέθανε ο πρώην ευρωβουλευτής Μενέλαος Χατζηγεωργίου -Το «αντίο» της ΝΔ ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Competitors in athletics Category:MEPs for Greece Category:Greek sportspeople
title: Menelaos Chadzigeorgiou
